        execute_process(

            WORKING_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}
            RESULT_VARIABLE git_result

        )
        message(STATUS "git workspace root [${git_result}]: ${git_root}")
        if ( "${git_result}" == "0" )
            set (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Debug)
        else ()
            set (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Release)
        endif ()
    endif ()
